article_node.title: Warren Buffett’s New Stock Bets Revealed — Should You Buy In, Too?
article_node.summary: Berkshire Hathaway’s latest 13F filing reveals five new holdings, including a surprising 5 million‑share stake in UnitedHealth Group (UNH) amid a DOJ Medicare‑fraud probe. Buffett’s team views UNH as a value play at roughly a 50% discount to its peak, expecting fines and executive turnover to be temporary and the company’s solid fundamentals to drive a rebound. The filing also shows a purchase of Allegion shares, underscoring Buffett’s continued focus on undervalued, high‑margin businesses.
